dct_title_s: Chorographie des conquêtes d'Alexandre en Asie et en Afrique
dct_description_sm: dirigée par Mr. Philippe ; M.A. Moithey.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Lieues frances".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features a pictorial vignette near title: [Soldiers].
Appears in Philippe de Prétot's Atlas universel. Paris : Nyon, 1787.
